org.matsim.vis.otfvis.interfaces

Interface OTFLiveServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OTFServer, PlayPauseSimulationControlI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OnTheFlyServer

    public interface OTFLiveServer
extends OTFServer, PlayPauseSimulationControlI
    If a OTFServer reports to be alive (by returning true in the method isLive()) it can savely be casted to an OTFLiveServerRemote instance. This offers additional options only useful with the actual running simulation. Most importantly the answering of queries.
    Author:
    dstrippgen
